title: Treadwell 14-Pack Safety Plus 30" x 6" Premium Clear Adhesive Non-Slip Stair Treads. Comfortable, Grit-Free, Non-Abrasive, Pre-Cut Safety Tape Prevents Slips and Falls. Easy Install Roller Included.
features: SUPERIOR SAFETY: Full sized premium rubberized high traction clear safety stair treads provide sure footing on smooth or slippery surfaces for your loved ones. PVC-free and far more durable than traditional tapes.

COMFORT: Grit-free adhesive stair treads are gentle on FEET and dog or pet PAWS. Unlike grit-based (sandpaper) products, textured tread is embossed onto the tape itself - no loose grit, painful scuffing or scraping.

LARGER: 30 in. x 6 in. treads (180 sq. in.) provide nearly twice the gripping area of 4 in. x 24 in. treads (96 sq. in.), leaving LESS slippery surface area exposed. Protect your wooden or other stair srufaces.
TRANSPARENT: Clear treads allow the natural beauty of wood, marble, tile and stone surfaces to show through.

VERSATILE: High strength adhesive and durable waterproof treads allow for indoor or outdoor usage. Also great for bathrooms, boats, ladders, poolside, or any smooth surface that needs sure footing. Pre-cut for easy installation with rounded corners to prevent snags.
description: Treadwell Clear Non-Slip Safety Stair Treads provide instant grip on surfaces in need of traction. Industrial grade texturized waterproof vinyl surface. Please apply to a CLEAN, DRY, SMOOTH surface for optimal results. Coarse or porous materials such as plywood, brick or unpolished cement will possibly be too porous, resulting in poor adhesion. Please also make sure to apply the strips to a surface that is neither very warm or very cold, as it may affect the curing of the adhesive. It is recommended that the treads are applied with light pressure to allow for easy removal of any air trapped under the surface. Once air pockets are removed, surface can be rolled or tamped down for optimal adhesion.
